titleStmt.title: By the King· A proclamation for restoring and discovering his Majesties goods
Proclamations. 1660-08-14
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the fourteenth day of August, in the twelfth year of our reign, 1660.
Steele notation: hath Prosecutions affected; Arms 64.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
